definitions.text: corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality
examples: debauch the young people with wine and women
Socrates was accused of corrupting young men
Do school counselors subvert young children?

definitions.text: violate the sacred character of a place or language
examples: violate the sanctity of the church

definitions.text: not concerned with or devoted to religion; ; ; ,
examples: children being brought up in an entirely profane environment

definitions.text: not holy because unconsecrated or impure or defiled
grossly irreverent toward what is held to be sacred
examples: blasphemous rites of a witches' Sabbath
it is sacrilegious to enter with shoes on
